name: Retro King Man
description:
The King Man is at it again - but this time for the first time! Again! How exciting! Platforming! Adventuring! Retroing! Fun for the whole family, as long as you are alone, because this game is single player only! RETRO KING MAN? YES!

Arbitrary List of Features:

  • GameBoy Styled Visuals
  • GameBoy Styled Audio
  • GameBoy Styled Gameplay
  • GameBoy Styled King Man!
